data.title: European Wax Center
data.meta_description: European Wax Center has pre-paid waxing packages for every lifestyle. Find your perfect Wax Pass and start saving on your favorite waxing services. Learn more.
data.text:
If you’re new to EWC, we have these special Wax Pass offers just for you! We love welcoming new guests to the wax suite and can’t wait to show you what makes us the Experts In Wax.

3 + 1 New Guest Wax Pass*

On your first visit to EWC, you’ll be eligible to purchase our exclusive New Guest Wax Pass. Buy 3 waxes, and get 1 free! This is the perfect “starter pack” for those who are new to waxing. It will get you to your third (and best!) wax while showing you the benefits of maintaining a wax routine.

9 + 3 Wax Pass**

Guests on their first OR second visit to EWC are eligible for our 9 + 3 Wax Pass. With this package, buy 9 waxes and get 3 free. This Wax Pass offers the best savings overall and will set you up with 12 waxes—that’s a full year of services! It makes maintaining a routine more simple than ever. Set it, forget it, and stay smooth all year round.

*3+1 New Guest Wax Pass®️ offer valid for new guests at their first visit at participating European Wax Center locations only for select services and limited to same service. Service and package prices may vary by location and are subject to change without notice. Each 3+1 New Guest Wax Pass for new guests will expire 6 months from the date of purchase, unless restricted or prohibited by applicable law. Subject to applicable taxes. Additional terms may apply.

**9+3 New Guest Wax Pass®️ offer valid for new guests on their first or second visit at participating European Wax Center locations only for select services and limited to same service. Service and package prices may vary by location and are subject to change without notice. Subject to applicable taxes. Additional terms may apply.

All European Wax Center franchises are independently owned and operated, so pricing will vary.

To easily learn how much you could save with a Single Center Wax Pass purchased online, use the pricing tool above to find your center’s pricing and calculate your savings!

To learn more about the pricing of Wax Passes that can be purchased in-center, click here to find your center and learn more about their pricing.

Studying is hard work, so we created a smaller, more affordable bundle for students. Treat yourself to smooth, beautiful skin all semester long with our Student Wax Pass®! Just bring your student ID to your local European Wax Center and get a free wax when you purchase three of any service.

*Available at select locations only. Please check with your local center to confirm the student program in your area.

We have a 30-Day Cancellation Policy for Wax Passes.

Should you decide to cancel your Wax Pass® within 30 days, you'll be charged the full price for visits you've already used and issued a refund for any remaining balance due.

Should you decide to cancel your Wax Pass® after 30 days, there is a $25 cancellation fee. European Wax Center® will charge you full price for the visits you already used and issue a store credit for any remaining balance due.

If your Wax Pass® was on an installment plan, you will be charged a $25 cancellation fee and issued store credit for the remaining unused balance of your installment-paid portion to use toward the full retail price on future services or products. Unpaid installments will not be credited.

Transfer Policy

Should you decide to transfer your package from one service type to another, you'll be charged the full price for the visits you've already used and issued a refund for any remaining balance due toward your new Wax Pass® purchase. There is no fee for transferring a Wax Pass®.

NOTE: Wax Pass® may not be transferred from one guest to another.
